---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---

packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

load data
```{r}
X35020903 <- read_csv("https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/35020903")
X35020903
```

wrangle data
```{r}
edit_x35 <- X35020903 %>%
 filter(sex %in% "Female" | is.na(sex)) %>%
 filter(!(lineage %in% "unknown"))
```

viz data
```{r}
ggplot(edit_x35) +
 aes(x = primary_disease, fill = lineage) +
 geom_bar() +
 scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
 coord_flip() +
 theme_minimal()
```
